metadata.title: CVE-2022-2962

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5

metadata.description: A DMA reentrancy issue was found in the Tulip device emulation in QEMU. When Tulip reads or writes to the rx/tx descriptor or copies the rx/tx frame, it doesn't check whether the destination address is its own MMIO address. This can cause the device to trigger MMIO handlers multiple times, possibly leading to a stack or heap overflow. A malicious guest could use this flaw to crash the QEMU process on the host, resulting in a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5 is installed
